title: Wine Vineyard Font
content:
Could anyone please help identify the font from [http://www.pauly-bergweiler.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120116065636/http:/www.pauly-bergweiler.com/ "http://www.pauly-bergweiler.com") ?

Attached below:

\*EDIT\* The image doesn't seem to want to attach, it's the one used as the main text for "Dr. Pauly Bergweiler" on the home page. Thanks
author: benbacardi

comments.content:
Hi Ben,

mmmh, this one looks quite familiar. Then again, I couldn’t find anything close.

This is most likely hand-drawn; look at the duplicate letters – they’re not identical. Still, I’d think there could/should be a font in this style. Will go on looking for it.

[Peter-Schlemihl-Schrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20120116065636/http:/www.waldenfont.com/typecase.asp?productid=2&fontid=19) by [Walter Tiemann](http://web.archive.org/web/20120116065636/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Walter%20Tiemann) has somewhat similar expansive ‘swash’ caps, at least for ‘B’ …

F
Thanks for your help - thing is, I'm to redesign the site and they don't seem to have any high resolution images of their logo or their font.
